title: Divya Spandana, former Congress social media head, emerges guns blazing on Twitter - The Indian Express
content:
1. Divya Spandana, former Congress social media head, emerges guns blazing on Twitter  The Indian Express
  2. Karnataka Youth Congress Chief Rationalizes Rahul Gandhi's Partying, Rebuffs Claims Of Rift in Party  India Today
  3. Ramya continues to field trolls on Twitter  The Hindu
  4. Divya Spandana vs Congress| Divya Spandana| Former Congress Social Media Head| Congress| CNN News18  CNN-News18
  5. ‘Office circulated messages to troll me’, says ex-Congress social media head Ramya, shares images  ThePrint
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: In a series of tweets posted on Thursday, actor Divya Spandana ‘Ramya', who had quit Congress, alleged that she has been trolled and abused by some party members in Karnataka.
